children.name: Introduction
Monitor and Analyze your Cycle Times

blocks.text:
This Dashboard focuses on the overall end-to-end time of a standard Order-to-Cash (OTC) process. Additionally, it shows the Cycle Time for various portions of the process (subprocess Cycle Time). 
Such a breakdown of Cycle Times can be used to identify bottlenecks in your process.
Page 1 - Overview: Key metrics to get a picture of the health of Order-to-Cash Cycle Time.
Page 2 - Deep Dive: Deep dive into further analysis of your Cycle Time.
Page 3  - Case Details: Sale, Delivery, and Invoice details in order to identify root causes.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.
Business terms abbreviations used in the dashboard: SO stand for "Sale Order" and PGI  stand for "Post Good Issue"

children.name: Overview
AVG Cycle Time: Quotation to SO
children.description: Desc: Average Cycle Time from creation of Quotation Item to Sales Order Item

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) 
    - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Quotation Item'))) 
AS "AVG Cycle Time Quotation to Sales Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: Create to Clear Invoice
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Create to Clearing of an Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')))      
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: Create to Post Invoice
children.description: Average Cycle Time from creation to post of an Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')))) 
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Cycle Time Process Discovery
AVG Cycle Time: Outbound Delivery to Goods Delivered
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Create Outbound Delivery to Goods Delivered

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(CreateShipmentOrder-CreateOutboundDelivery)
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id, 
      LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
      WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Goods Delivered')) as CreateShipmentOrder,
      FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
      WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) as CreateOutboundDelivery
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)) as sub

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: SO to Outbound Delivery
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Create Sales Order Item to Create Outbound Delivery

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery'))
	- 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')))
	AS "sd creation to Delivery creation"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: SO to Clear Invoice by Sales Organization
children.description: AVG Cycle Time from Create Sales Order Item to Clear Invoice breakdown by Sale Organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')))) AS "Process Cycle Time"
    ,"SalesDocSalesOrganization"  AS "Sales organization"
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 10

children.name: AVG Cycle Time
children.description: Desc: Average Cycle Time from calculated from the first to the last event

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time))
		- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
AS "AVG Cycle Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Deep Dive
AVG Cycle Time: Create to Clear Invoice over months breakdown
children.description: Average Cycle Time for all invoices from creating to clearing invoice, breakdown by month

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	DATE_TRUNC('MONTH', (SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')))) AS "Invoice creation date",
        
    AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))) 
    - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')))) AS "AVG Cycle Time"     	
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
ORDER BY 1 ASC NULLS FIRST
FILL timeseries('MONTH')

children.name: AVG Cycle Time analysis per company
children.description: The table shows the Average Cycle Times between main events of the process end-to-end

columnConfigurations.columnAlias: Cycle Time from Posting to Clearing Invoice
Cycle Time from Goods Receipt to Posting Invoice
Cycle Time from Payment Run Proposal to Clearing Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT "InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company",
    COUNT("case_id") AS "Number of cases",
    	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) 
    - 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Quotation Item'))) 
	AS "AVG Cycle Time Quotation to Sales Order",
        AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) 
    ))) AS "AVG Cycle Time from Sales Order to Outbound Delivery",
        AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Post Goods Issue')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) 
    ))) AS "AVG Cycle Time from Outbound Delivery to PGI",  
    AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Post Invoice')))
		- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Post Goods Issue'))
    ))) AS "AVG Cycle Time from PGI to Post Invoice", 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE "event_name" IN ('Clear Invoice')))
	- (SELECT FIRST("end_time") FILTER (WHERE ("event_name" IN ('Create Invoice'))
    ))) AS "AVG Cycle Time from Create to Clear invoice",
    AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time))- (SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
    AS "AVG Cycle Time"
FROM THIS_PROCESS 
WHERE "InvoiceCompanyCode" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: Create to Clear Invoice
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Create to Clear an invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
	- (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')))   
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Late payments AVG Cycle Time: Create to Clear Invoice breakdown by Company
children.description: Average Cycle Time to Clear Invoice after due date has passed breakdown by Company

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(clearingdate-InvoiceDueDate) AS "Clearing Time"
	   ,"Company"
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id, 
	 InvoiceDueDate,
     LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice'))
     as clearingdate,
    "InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)) as sub
WHERE "InvoiceDueDate" < "clearingdate"
  AND  "Company" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC

children.name: Late payments AVG Cycle Time: Create to Clear Invoice
children.description: Average payment Cycle Time from Create to Clear an invoice where payments done after invoice due date

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(ClearingDate-CreationDate)
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id, 
	 LAST (InvoiceDueDate) AS InvoiceDueDate,
     LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) as ClearingDate,
     FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')) as CreationDate
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE InvoiceDueDate < ClearingDate

children.name: On-Time Payments AVG Cycle Time: Create to Clear invoice
children.description: Average Cycle Time of invoices paid until invoice due date from posting to clearing

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(ClearingDate-CreateDate)
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id, 
	 LAST(InvoiceDueDate) AS InvoiceDueDate
     ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) 
     as ClearingDate
     ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')) as CreateDate
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)) as sub
WHERE "InvoiceDueDate" >= "ClearingDate"

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: Quotation to SO
children.description: Average Cycle Time from creation of Quotation Item to Sales Order Item

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) 
    - 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Quotation Item'))) 
AS "AVG Cycle Time Quotation to Sales Order"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: Quotation to SO breakdown
children.description: Average Cycle Time from the creation of Quotation Item to Sales Order Item by company breakdown

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG 
	((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) 
    - 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Quotation Item'))) 
    AS "AVG Cycle Time Quotation to Sales Order"
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Comapny"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: SO to Outbound Delivery
children.description: Average Cycle Time from creation of Sales Order Item to Outbound Delivery

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) 
    - 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item'))) 
	AS "AVG Cycle Time Sales Order to Delivery"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: SO to Outbound Delivery breakdown
children.description: Average Cycle Time from the creation of Sales Order Item to Outbound Delivery by company breakdown

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG 
	((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) 
    - (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item'))) 
    AS "AVG Cycle Time Sales Order to Delivery"
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: Outbound Delivery to PGI
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Outbound Delivery to Post Goods Issue (PGI)

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Issue')) 
    - 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery'))) 
	AS "AVG Cycle Time Delivery to PGI"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: Outbound Delivery to PGI breakdown
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Outbound Delivery to Post Goods Issue (PGI) by company breakdown

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Issue')) 
    - 
	(SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery'))) 
    AS "AVG Cycle Time Delivery to PGI"
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: PGI to Invoice
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Post Goods Issue (PGI) to Create Invoice

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME  IN ('Create Invoice')) 
    - 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Issue'))) 
	AS "AVG cycly time PGI to Invoice"
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: AVG Cycle Time: PGI to Invoice breakdown
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Post Goods Issue (PGI) to Create Invoice by company breakdown

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG ((SELECT LAST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Invoice')) 
    - 
    (SELECT FIRST (END_TIME) 
    WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Issue'))) 
    AS "AVG Cycle Time PGI to Invoice"
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: On-Time Shipment AVG Cycle Time: SO to Goods Delivered
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Sale Order creation to Goods Delivered for On-Time Shipment

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(DeliveryDate-SaleOrderDate)
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Goods Delivered')) AS DeliveryDate
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='Yes'

children.name: Late Shipment AVG Cycle Time: SO to PGI
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Sale Order creation to Goods Delivered for On-Time Shipment

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(ShipmentDate-SaleOrderDate)
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Issue')) as ShipmentDate
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='No'

children.name: On-Time Shipment AVG Cycle Time: SO to PGI
children.description: Entire process Average Cycle Time from Create Sales Order Item to Post Goods Issue for On-Time Shipment by company breakdown

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(PGIdate-SaleOrderDate) AS "Process Cycle Time", Company
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Post Goods Issue')) as PGIdate
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
    --,"SalesDocCustomerCountry" AS "Country"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='Yes'
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 10

children.name: Late Shipment AVG Cycle Time: SO to PGI
children.description: Entire process Average Cycle Time from Create Sales Order Item to Clear Invoice for Late Shipment by company breakdown

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(ClearDate-SaleOrderDate) AS "Process Cycle Time", Company
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Clear Invoice')) as ClearDate
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='No'
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: AVG vs. Median Cycle Time: End-to-end Process breakdown by Customer Country
children.description: Average vs. Median Cycle Time calculated from the first to the last event for completed process by Customer Country breakdown

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
	AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time))
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) AS "Average"
   ,MEDIAN((SELECT LAST(end_time))
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time))) AS "Median"
    ,"SalesDocCustomerCountry" AS "Country"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES(^'Create Sales Order Item' ~> 'Create Outbound Delivery'~>'Clear Invoice')
ORDER BY 2 DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 10

children.name: Average Cycle Time for the process's four main steps from Quotation to Invoice creation:
children.description: Average Cycle Time between main steps in the process

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(ShipmentDate-SaleOrderDate)
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Goods Delivered')) as ShipmentDate
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='No'

children.name: On-Time Shipment AVG Cycle Time: Delivery process

dataSource.query:

FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Goods Delivered')) as ShipmentDate
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='Yes'

children.name: On-Time Shipment AVG Cycle Time: Delivery process
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Create Outbound Delivery to Goods Delivered for On-Time Shipment by Company

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(ClearDate-SaleOrderDate) AS "Process Cycle Time", Company
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Goods Delivered')) as ClearDate
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
    --,"SalesDocCustomerCountry" AS "Country"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='Yes'
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: Late Shipment AVG Cycle Time: Delivery process
children.description: Average Cycle Time from Create Outbound Delivery to Goods Delivered for Late Shipment

dataSource.query:
SELECT AVG(ClearDate-SaleOrderDate) AS "Process Cycle Time", Company
FROM (SELECT DISTINCT case_id
	,LAST (DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime) AS DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime
    ,LAST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Outbound Delivery')) as SaleOrderDate
    ,FIRST (END_TIME) FILTER (
     WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Goods Delivered')) as ClearDate
    ,"InvoiceCompanyCode" AS "Company"
FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
) as sub
WHERE DeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime='No'
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: Average Cycle Time for Invoices processing
children.description: Average Cycle Time analysis for Invoices processing

children.name: AVG Cycle Time end-to-end process details
children.description: Average Cycle Time details for end-to-end process

children.name: End-to-end Process Cycle Time per country
children.description: Average Cycle Time calculated from the first to the last event for completed process

dataSource.query:
SELECT
	COUNT (DISTINCT "case_id") 
    FILTER (WHERE (SELECT BOOL_OR (EVENT_NAME IN ('Create Sales Order Item')))
    ) AS "Number of cases"
    ,AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time))
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time))
    	) AS "Average Cycle Time"
   ,MEDIAN((SELECT LAST(end_time))
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time))
    ) AS "Median Cycle Time"
    ,MAX((SELECT LAST(end_time))
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time))
    ) AS "Max Cycle Time"
	,MIN((SELECT LAST(end_time))
	- (SELECT FIRST(end_time))
    ) AS "Min Cycle Time"
    ,"SalesDocCustomerCountry" AS "Country"
FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE event_name MATCHES(^'Create Sales Order Item' ~> 'Create Outbound Delivery'~>'Clear Invoice')
	AND 'Create Sales Order Item' IS NOT NULL
	AND 'Create Outbound Delivery'IS NOT NULL
    AND 'Clear Invoice' IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 1 DESC NULLS LAST

children.name: Case Details
Case Details
children.description: The table shows all cases including important Details to be considered for Cycle Time purposes

dataSource.query:
SELECT
    case_id, 
    SalesDocId AS "Sales Document Id",
    InvoiceCompanyCode AS "Company Code",
    SalesDocSalesOrganization AS Organization,
    (SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
        WHERE event_name IN (
            'Create Sales Order Item',
            'Create Quotation Item',
            'Create Contract Item'))
    ) AS "SD Creation Date",
    SalesDocType AS "Sales Document Type",
    SalesDocItemQuantityOrdered AS "Quantity Ordered",
    SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed AS "Quantity Confirmed",
    DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered AS "Quantity Delivered",
    LastDeliveryGoodsMovementOnTime AS "On Time",
    CASE
        WHEN SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed = DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered THEN 'Yes'
        WHEN SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed < DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered THEN 'Overdelivery'
        WHEN SalesDocItemQuantityConfirmed > DeliveryTotalQuantityDelivered THEN 'No'
    END AS "In Full",
    SalesDocItemNetValue AS "Net Value",
    SalesDocCustomerCompany AS "Customer Company",
    SalesDocCustomerCountry AS "Customer Country",
    SalesDocItemMaterialGroup AS "Material Group",
    SalesDocItemMaterial AS Material,
    SalesDocLastConfirmedDeliveryDate AS "Confirmed Delivery Date",
    SalesDocPlannedShipmentDate AS "Planned Shipment Date",
    LastDeliveryWarehouse AS "Delivery Warehouse",
    AVG((SELECT LAST(end_time))
		-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)))
    AS "AVG Cycle Time"
FROM
  THIS_PROCESS
  ORDER BY 1 DESC
